title: The Placebo Effect much needed answers (Stew john)
text: * Sleep disorders * Menopause In an interesting study it was noticed that when asthma patients were given placebo inhaler, it didn't produced any kind of significant impact upon breathing, but when patients were asked by researchers that how they felt after using the inhaler majority responded by saying that effectiveness of placebo inhaler was as good as medicine and it provided relief to them.The research which is being carried out upon placebo effect actually focuses upon the relationship that is present between body and mind. An important concept here is that expectations of the patient play a great role in his recovery and treatment. If there is expectation inside a patient that a pill or medicine can bring medical benefits for him, then it is very much possible that internal chemistry of body can start to produce effects that are caused by medication. At FSTE the main focus is to highlight and bring forward the relationship present between mind and body. Experts, mention that relationship is very much present, between what are the expectations of a person with a particular treatment and if the answer to question is evaluated then it can bring a great medical revolution. The placebo effect can actually be very much useful in treatment of patients and Foundation for the Science of the Therapeutic Encounter is finding the much needed connection by means of practical research. About the Author The mission of F-STE is to advance the fields of the patient-clinican relationship and placebo studies by supporting targeted research that leads to ground-breaking findings that can lay the groundwork for substantive improvements in healthcare delivery.Learn more about F-STE visit the website .
